name: Blue Advertising
description:
Blue is an award-winning advertising agency specializing in reputation, public affairs and advocacy advertising. Blue is organized to ensure senior-level involvement in every assignment and combines “Madison Avenue” creative standards with metric-moving skills honed in our past political work.
Our expertise is in creating strategic campaigns that raise awareness, frame public discussions, engage audiences and affect behaviors, whether it be to enhance an industry’s reputation, elevate a cause or win a policy debate.
